outputs.output_descr: the project  focuses on strenghening the capacity of the Anseba Region in participatory development processes including planning, project implementation and monitoring to improve access to & management of financial resources for funding development plans by Local Government Units in Anseba and strengthen the regional & local capacities to deliver, operate and maintain projects efficiently (e.g., micro-dam based water supply systems).

project_descr: The project provide support in the Anseba region in building the capacity of the zoba as well as in the decentralization as a pilot project. The project is funded by UNDP and UNCDF.
